name: Digital Signature Expiry Date Extender
description:
The Digital Signature Expiry Date Extender uses a technic called Long-Term Validation (LTV) to ensure the integrity and authenticity of digital objects over an extended period of time. 
LTV works by verifying the digital signature of a digital object at regular intervals to ensure that the object has not changed since its original creation. 
The plugin uses the mLTV service provided by Multicert to extend the validity of documentâ€™s digital signatures by applying timestamps and integrated status information to the content of a PDF document. 
The mLTV is an external webservice provided by Multicert. 
As such it requires a service contract from Multicert to be used.
